attributes.action: Men to be given automatic parental responsibility like women when a baby is due.
attributes.additional_details: Men all over have been forcefully removed from their children's lifes, damaging (sometimes permanently) the bonds between them. Children without the input of both able parents have shown a negative psychological response time and time again, Dads who have been forced to the sidelines have experienced everything from hopelessness to depression to suicide. This needs to be stopped!
attributes.background: It should be the right of both legal parents to be granted equal access to their child. 50/50 access should be a mandatory norm regardless of the parents gender, where automatic refusal of child support is put in place when 1 parent refuses access without sound reasoning.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300183
